TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ExportParameterAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Within the method that is marked with , specify the actual Java type of the corresponding parameter or return value.

remarks.para: and are used to generate Java method and/or field explicitly in Android Callable Wrappers (ACWs), with specific name. Since Mono for Android maps more than one Java types to one managed type, the signature for the Java method that corresponds to an exported managed method cannot be determined without detailed specification. is used in such usage scenario, to indicate which Java type it is used in the generated code.
For details, see ExportAttribute section of the documentation page.
This type is introduced in Mono for Android 4.2.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Java.Interop.ExportParameterKind kind) cil managed

Docs.param: The value, which becomes property value.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of this attribute.
Docs.remarks: Creates a new instance of this attribute.

Docs.summary: The Java type used for the corresponding Android Callable Wrapper (ACW).
Docs.value: Indicates the java type for the ACW code for this parameter in the containing method.
Docs.remarks: For the Java types that can be specified by this property, see enumeration.
